response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item offers unparalleled benefits that can significantly enhance your daily operations or personal life. Considering its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $12,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $15,000. This special price reflects my confidence in the product's value and my desire to see it in the right hands. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any additional information to consider this proposal.", "product_price": 15000}
